channel.title: Special attack? [317]
channel.description: well...there seems 2 be a problem. On all of my weapons that have special, when i click special attack, it does not preform the spec. For example, my godswords. i have all the correct gfx and anims...but....i just doesn't do them. lol. any idea how 2 fix this?
